title: Critical Minerals, CBAM, and AGOA | The Trade Guys | CSIS Podcasts
author: Podcast Episode by H Andrew Schwartz; William Alan Reinsch; Scott Miller Published April
text:
Critical Minerals, CBAM, and AGOA Subscribe and Listen This week on the Trade Guys, we discuss the potential for new critical mineral agreements, how the administration's new climate task force is thinking about CBAM, and the new AGOA proposal. Image 
               Senior Adviser and Scholl Chair Emeritus, Economics Program and Scholl Chair in International Business
excerpt: The Trade Guys discuss the potential for new critical mineral agreements, how the administration's new climate task force is thinking about CBAM, and the new AGOA proposal.
